chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (p0 p1 : prec_list) (d0 d1 : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok p0 d0 -> prec_list_ref_ok p1 d1 -> prec_list_ref_ok (pl_produit p0 p1) (preDTA_produit d0 d1)

Premises:
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
pl_produit = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl_produit_1 pl0 (pl_essence pl0 pl1) pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list
preDTA_produit = fix preDTA_produit (d0 d1 : preDTA) {struct d1} : preDTA := match d0 with | @M0 _ => match d1 with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 state end | @M1 _ a0 s0 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M1 state a1 s1) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => preDTA_produit_l a0 s0 (M2 state s10 s11) end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match d1 with | @M0 _ => M0 state | @M1 _ a1 s1 => preDTA_produit_r a1 s1 (M2 state s00 s01)
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
preDTA = Map state : Set
inter = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 a0 => match d1 with | dta p1 a1 => dta (preDTA_produit p0 p1) (iad_conv a0 a1) end end : DTA -> DTA -> DTA
pl_produit_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (p0 p1 : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p0 n -> pl_tl_length p1 n -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit p0 p1) n
pl_produit_rec_0 : forall tl : term_list, (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u -> reconnaissance d1 a1 u -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) u) -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path.pl_path), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon d0 tl plp0 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon d1 tl plp1 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon (preDTA_produit d0 d1) tl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1)
preDTA_produit_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (preDTA_produit d0 d1) sigma
pl_produit_rec_2 : forall tl : term_list, (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) u -> reconnaissance d0 a0 u /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 u) -> forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (plp : pl_path.pl_path), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_path.pl_path_recon (preDTA_produit d0 d1) tl plp -> exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path.pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path.pl_path_recon d0 tl plp0 /\ pl_path.pl_path_recon d1 tl plp1
predta_inter_direct : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t
prec_list_ref_ok_destr : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok (prec_cons a la ls) d -> prec_list_ref_ok la d /\ prec_list_ref_ok ls d
predta_inter_reciproque : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (t : term), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 t
pl_produit_ref_ok_lem_6 : forall (p0 p1 : prec_list) (b : ad), prec_occur (pl_produit p0 p1) b -> exists a0 a1 : ad, b = iad_conv a0 a1 /\ prec_occur p0 a0 /\ prec_occur p1 a1
predta_inter_def_0 = fun t : term => forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t -> reconnaissance d1 a1 t -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t : term -> Prop
predta_inter_def_1 = fun t : term => forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d0 d1 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) t -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t /\ reconnaissance d1 a1 t : term -> Prop
s_produit_0 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit s0 s1) c = Some (pl_produit p0 p1)
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
pl_produit_rec_3 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat), liste_reconnait (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1) tl -> predta_compatible d0 d1 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d2 d3 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d2 d3 -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d2 d3) (iad_conv a0 a1) u -> reconnaissance d2 a0 u /\ reconnaissance d3 a1 u) -> liste_reconnait d0 pl0 tl /\ liste_reconnait d1 pl1 tl
pl_produit_rec_1 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), liste_reconnait d0 pl0 tl -> liste_reconnait d1 pl1 tl -> pl_tl_length pl0 (lst_length tl) -> pl_tl_length pl1 (lst_length tl) -> predta_compatible d0 d1 -> (forall u : term, term_list_occur u tl -> forall (d2 d3 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad), predta_compatible d2 d3 -> reconnaissance d2 a0 u -> reconnaissance d3 a1 u -> reconnaissance (preDTA_produit d2 d3) (iad_conv a0 a1) u) -> liste_reconnait (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1) tl
predta_correct_wrt_sign_M2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign (M2 state d0 d1) sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma /\ predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma
prec_list_ref_ok_check_correct : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok p d -> prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true
prec_list_ref_ok_check_complete : forall (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok_check p d = true -> prec_list_ref_ok p d
predta_produit_2 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) (iad_conv a0 a1) = Some (s_produit s0 s1)
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct_dest : forall d0 d1 d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct (M2 state d0 d1) d -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d0 d /\ preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d1 d
predta_produit_5 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state (preDTA_produit d0 d1) a = Some s -> exists (a0 a1 : ad) (s0 s1 : state), a = iad_conv a0 a1 /\ MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 /\ MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1
pl_produit_ref_ok_1 = fun p0 p1 : prec_list => forall (b : ad) (n : nat), prec_occur (pl_produit_1 p0 n p1) b -> exists a0 a1 : ad, b = iad_conv a0 a1 /\ prec_occur p0 a0 /\ prec_occur p1 a1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
predta_compatible_compat_def = fun d0 : preDTA => forall d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 : preDTA -> Prop
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
iad_conv = fun a0 a1 : ad => match a0 with | 0%N => match a1 with | 0%N => 0%N | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_0 p1) end | N.pos p0 => match a1 with | 0%N => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_1 p0) | N.pos p1 => N.pos (iad_conv_aux_2 p0 p1) end end : ad -> ad -> ad

```coq
intros p0 p1 d0 d1 H0 H1.
unfold prec_list_ref_ok.
intros a Ha.
rewrite pl_produit_ref_ok_lem_6 in Ha.
destruct Ha as [a0 [a1 [Ha0 [Ha1 Ha2]]]].
assert (H2: exists s0 : state, MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0).
apply H0.
apply Ha0.
assert (H3: exists s1 : state, MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1).
apply H1.
apply Ha1.
destruct H2 as [s0 H2].
destruct H3 as [s1 H3].
exists (s_produit s0 s1).
apply predta_produit_2 with (a0:=a0) (a1:=a1) (s0:=s0) (s1:=s1).
apply H2.
apply H3.
Qed.

original: intros p0 p1 d0 d1 H0 H1. unfold prec_list_ref_ok. intros a Ha. rewrite pl_produit_ref_ok_lem_6 in Ha. destruct Ha as [a0 [a1 [Ha0 [Ha1 Ha2]]]]. assert (H2: exists s0 : state, MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0). apply H0. apply Ha0. assert (H3: exists s1 : state, MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1). apply H1. apply Ha1. destruct H2 as [s0 H2]. destruct H3 as [s1 H3]. exists (s_produit s0 s1). apply predta_produit_2 with (a0:=a0) (a1:=a1) (s0:=s0) (s1:=s1). apply H2. apply H3.
